hard: Helios- When Dante is combined with Jet for critical damage go for Helios
Jorgen – Works when Dante is used as a frontline hero Jorgen will steal energy from him. Most of the time Dante won’t survive long enough to instantly kill the enemy team
soft: Armor artifact – Dante is all about the physical damage. When armor artifact is up he deals a low amount of damage.

Not having low health heroes – Dante can one-shot enemy team if he gets 2 kills with his active skill making him use the active skill again, stacking artifacts,s and dealing double active skill damage in a short period of time. Even the strongest heroes can struggle to survive after that bug burst of damage.
Mages – Dante can’t dodge magic attacks, using good mage teams like Twins or ODH is a good choice to increase your chances to win the battle.
